name: Artillery (PolyGalleon)
description:
Third person shooter (Local MultiPlayer) where you can play as an assassin where you will wield dual blades to slice your enemies or as a soldier where you will be using guns to shoot down your enemies

Build your weapon energy and upgrade your stats by buying character and weapon upgrades to keep up with your enemies. Use your character ability and weapon ultimate ability to defeat your enemies or to get your self out of sticky situations.

Contact: polygalleon@gmail.com

PolyGalleon Studios  All rights reserved     https://polygalleon.itch.io/
